course: Ahuahu Fund for Conservation Biology Scholarship
program: Graduate and Postgraduate, Postgraduate Research, PhD, Doctoral
scholarshipDetail: Stipend awards of up to $1000 (or the limit of available funds if less)

course: AUT International scholarships for Southeast Asia
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $5,000 paid in the first year of study for undergraduate. Contribution to tuition fees of $7,000 paid in the first year of study for postgraduate.

course: International scholarships by AUT faculty of Business, Economics and Law
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $5,000 paid in the first year of study towards a Foundation, Diploma, Bachelor’s of Business degree or Bachelor’s of Law.

course: International scholarships by AUT faculty of Culture and Society
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $5,000 paid in the first year of study for undergraduate program and $7,000 for postgraduate program in the Faculty of Culture and Societypaid for the first year of study

course: AUT Dean’s Merit Scholarships
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $7,000 in first year, $3,000 in second year (Total value: $10,000) towards a Bachelor’s degree

course: International scholarships by AUT faculty of Design and Creative Technologies
scholarshipDetail: Contribution to tuition fees of $5,000 paid in the first year of study for undergraduate program and $7,000 for postgraduate program in Faculty of Design and Creative Technologies

course: AUT Vice-Chancellor’s Doctoral Scholarships
scholarshipDetail: Each Vice-Chancellor’s Doctoral Scholarship consists of an annual stipend of $33,000, plus tuition fees and compulsory student services fee for up to three years.

course: AUT Doctoral Scholarships
scholarshipDetail: Each Vice-Chancellor’s Doctoral Scholarship consists of an annual stipend of $33,000, plus tuition fees and compulsory student services fee for up to three years.

course: International School Leaver Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - Up to $20,000 Anually

course: ASEAN High Achievers Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship -  up to $10,000 towards tuition fees for new international students from ASEAN countries

course: International Student Excellence Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - up to $10,000 towards compulsory tuition fees

course: University of Auckland Foundation Pathway High Achiever Award
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - An Award to assist high achievers from our Foundation Pathway partners who are enrolling in their first semester of study with a contribution towards of compulsory tuition fees of up to $20,000.

course: University of Auckland Pathway Partner High Achiever Award
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - An award of up to $10,000 for international students from our Pathway Partner NCUK enrolling in the first year of an undergraduate degree.

course: ELA High Achiever Award
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - An award of $5000 for ELA FCert EAP students who wish to enrol in undergraduate studies at the University of Auckland.

course: Summer Research Scholarships
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - Conduct a research project under supervision for 10 weeks over the summer months. Receive a tax-free stipend of $6,750, paid in fortnightly instalments.

course: Graeme Edwards Award in Music
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - An Award of up to $8,000 to support international or domestic undergraduate or postgraduate music students undertaking study in organ or early keyboard.

course: Beatrice Ratcliffe Entry-Level Scholarship in Music
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - up to $5,000 for international and domestic students commencing full-time undergraduate study in the School of Music.

course: Veza Family Entry-Level Scholarship in Music
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - up to $5,000 to support a domestic or international student enrolled in the first year of a BMus or BMus conjoint degree.

course: Dean's Asia Scholarship in the Faculty of Business and Economics
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - to assist international undergraduate students from Asia enrolling full-time in the first year of a BCom, BProp or associated conjoint degree.

course: Chillisoft Scholarship in Cybersecurity
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - A $5,000 Scholarship for international and domestic, undergraduate or postgraduate, full-time or part-time enrolment in the Faculty of Science in study relating to Cybersecurity.

course: Kiwiplan Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - A Scholarship of up to $4,500 for undergraduate study in BSc or BAdvSci(Hons) in Computer Science or BSc Information and Technology Management; or BE(Hons) in Software Engineering

course: Michael Joseph Savage Memorial Award in Music
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - A $4,000 Award to support a student enrolled in the second or subsequent year of a Bachelor of Music.

course: University of Auckland High Performance Sports Scholarship
scholarshipDetail: Partial Schoalrship - A $5,000 Scholarship to support students with the potential to succeed both academically and in their chosen sport for first year of an undergraduate programme.
